page.title: 14 THE TROUT FARM
page.content: The trout sold are rainbow and brown trout,the trout are fed on pellets.They sell fish all the year round.The trout farm is 650 acres of land-400acres of corn, 60 acres of grass, the rest is woodland.5000 trout are farmed per year 4000 sold to shops, others stay to grow . April- september fishermen may fish for 4trout maximum,costing 12pounds. Small fish are thrown back in.At the second trout farm, there are about 65,000 trout.Trt sold are brown and rainbow,1% die due to overcrowding in the tanks, the rest are sold.Baby fish are kept in two baths in the shed.The babies move to the adult pond at about 9to 12 months of age. The trout are sold at about 1to 3 years old.
